item.title: Git_controlled_doc_on_confluence
item.author: Victor Ma
item.description: Why Git can be used for managing changes to other types of files, such as documents. For documents related to code and infra, Confluence can be just a publshing system, while the Version tracking, Collaboration, Branching and Backup happens at Git side. There should be a CICD pipeline to deploy changes to Confluence. Instruction Confluence Publisher can be used for this purpose. Refer to it’s Github for details. Also Docker Image seems to be updated recently as well.
